Text: no subjectHi Mark I didnt name her but Kitty from Absolute Heavenly Massage will come out to the house the evening of the third I will give her directions Here is her number She sounds legitimate nothing sleazy Call her and alert her as to what time you guesstimate your arrival Thanks Martina

no subjectHi Mark Directions from Icoming from Montana When you get to the Coeur d Alene vicinity in Idaho you will take EXIT Hwy Sandpoint Moscow Turn right which will head you North on Hwy towards Sandpoint I can either meet you I am on the way or you can drive about milesthere will be a flashing yellow light on the right hand side of the road and a Greenwood St sign kind of far in on the right It is right before the parking lot for the Long Bridge Grill you turn right on Greenwood If you have gone over the long bridge over the lake you have gone too far Drive to the first and only street No sign you cannot miss it turn right It is the nd house on the left Harbor View I will leave the key under the door mat for you If you like I will meet you or you can follow me upor not I am awaiting confirmation of availability from or masseuses I will get you the number of the one who can do it Any questions you think of let me know Ill be in touch Martina PS the last guest left my number a directions at homedont forget them
